_header: Christ cried in cradle moder ba ba / The children of Israel
Note: For a somewhat similar carol see 3422.
Subjects: carols, of the Innocents; Holy Innocents
_description: ‘In die sanctorum Innocencium’ — six quatrains (aaab) and burden (bb): ‘With al the reuerens that we may / Worchip we childermas day’

BodDou302.First Lines:
Crist crid in cradil moder babaþe childer of iral cridyn wa
                    wa…
BodDou302.Last Lines:
…he wil ȝoue crowne in his kyngdom& folou þe
                    lomb in ioy for ay
